article_title: Hillary makes presidential campaign stop in Ashland
article_text:
Huntington, WV (25701)

Today

Sun and clouds mixed. A stray shower or thunderstorm is possible. High around 90F. Winds light and variable..

Tonight

A few clouds. A stray shower or thunderstorm is possible. Low 66F. Winds SSE at 5 to 10 mph.

article_metadata.author: DAVID E. MALLOY
